mil.nga.giat.geowave.vector.adapter

Class FeatureRowBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.nga.giat.geowave.vector.adapter.FeatureRowBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NativeFieldHandler.RowBuilder<org.opengis.feature.simple.SimpleFeature,Object>

    public class FeatureRowBuilder
extends Object
implements NativeFieldHandler.RowBuilder<org.opengis.feature.simple.SimpleFeature,Object>
    A GeoWave RowBuilder, used internally by AbstractDataAdapter to construct rows from a set field values (in this case SimpleFeatures from a set of attribute values). This implementation simply wraps a geotools SimpleFeatureBuilder.
